name: Root Of Evil Origins
description:
In collaboration with Red Inc Games

Root Of Evil : Origins, is a spinoff game of the Root Of Evil series made by Red Inc Games, set between sometime before Root Of Evil VR, Root Of Evil : Origins takes us to an odd looking manor set in the deep forest, held captive by your mysterious Uncle, you have to find a way to escape.

Controls. -
  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • LClick/E - Interact
  • Shift - Sprint
  • F - Flashlight
  • X - Camera Zoom Q/E - Lean Right/Left
  • CTRL/C - Crouch
  • RClick - Steady Flashlight
Currently in the game. -
  • Flashlight and Stamina                                     
  • AI and Jumpscares
  • Findable objects  ( E.g. Battery, Notes )
  • Variety of spawns for AI and Battery
  • Obtainable Ending
Planned for Future updates. -
  • New Map ( The School ) 
  • Mobile Port ( Until Able to Do So )
  • Multiplayer ( Subject to Change ) 
  • Different Endings  
  • Level Reworks  
  • More UI ( E.g. Pause, Etc.)

Made by Students, in collaboration with Red Inc Games

THIS GAME IS IN EARLY ACCESS, EVERYTHING YOU SEE IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE, EXPECT BUGS/GLITCHES
